channel.title: NEW server advertisement board --deployment
channel.description:
i need some people to be with me cause i feel like hosting a new server advertisement board on
www.rsaddict.co.uk
if you want you can view rsaddict now but if ya really want me to host a server advertisement board please post here or if ya really wnt to pm me
[url=http://rsaddict.co.uk]click here to view the forum ill host it on[/url]
NOTE:i am hosting it now on rsaddict.co.uk but i want it to become the official advertisement board
